title: 'Zoolander 2' Trailer Was Perfect Surprise For 'Mission: Impossible' Fans
text:
Popular Posts Full Bio 
I've studied the film industry, both academically and informally, and with an emphasis in box office analysis, for 28 years. I have extensively written about all of said subjects for the last ten years. My outlets for film criticism, box office commentary, and film-skewing scholarship have included The Huffington Post, Salon, and Film Threat. Follow me at @ScottMendelson and "like" The Ticket Booth on Facebook. The author is a Forbes contributor. The opinions expressed are those of the writer. Loading...
